name: Relativity (itch) (Stupidplusplus)
description:
A short puzzle game based on M.C. Escher's Relativity.

Credit:

- Made by Pelle Bruinsma

- Sound effects and nature assets by Kenney (kenney.nl)

- Original 3D model by Benoit Gagnier

- Inspired by and based on the original artwork "Relativity" by Maurits Cornelis Escher.

Special thanks to Damian Been, Jelmer Waaksma and Siyana Illieve
